窞字的基本解释

窞
dàn
深坑：“入于坎窞。”
旁入。

窞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàn］
［《廣韻》徒感切，上感，定。］
小而深的坑。

窞字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窞； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页866第32
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒感切，音萏。【說文】坎中小坎也。一曰旁入也。【易·坎卦】習坎入于坎窞。【註】最處坎底，入坎窞者。【馬融·長笛賦】?窞巖?。　又【集韻】盧感切，婪上聲。義同。或作欿。

窞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
窞字的起名意思

暂无。

窞

dàn

[①]［dàn］
["Guangyun" has a strong sense of appetite, sense of supremacy, and determination. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窞; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 866 32
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? A sense of appetite, sound 萏. [Said the text] Kan is also small and medium. One said, enter the side. 【Yi·Kan Gua】Xi Kan enters into Kandi. [Note] At the bottom of the hurdle, the person who enters the hurdle. [Ma Rong·Flute Fu]? Diyan?.　[Jiyun] Lu feels eager and greedily speaks. The same meaning. Or make Yi.
